short_description: Real-time audio reasoning model with multimodal capabilities, featuring 'Mind-Paced Speaking' and 'Acoustic-Grounded Reasoning'.

provenance.notes: Step-Audio-R1.1 (Realtime) is a major upgrade to Step-Audio-R1. It employs a Dual-Brain Architecture (Formulation Brain + Articulation Brain) for low-latency chain-of-thought reasoning during speech.

architecture_details: Audio encoder (Qwen2Audio) + Audio Adaptor + LLM Decoder (Qwen2.5 32B). Dual-Brain Architecture decouples reasoning and articulation.

capabilities.audio_reasoning: State-of-the-art audio reasoning with test-time compute scaling (MGRD).
capabilities.realtime_dialogue: Supports thinking while speaking with sub-second latency.
capabilities.speech_reasoning: 96.1% Speech Reasoning Performance Score on Big Bench Audio (Speech-to-Speech).

notes: Step-Audio-R1.1 demonstrates top-ranking results on the Big Bench Audio (Speech-to-Speech) benchmark, surpassing Gemini 2.5 Flash and GPT-4o mini Realtime.
